TopicTitle: Mod for custom spacecraft models imported to KSP2?

Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

New to KSP2, could anyone tell me if there's a mod for KSP2 that would allow me to add my own detailed 3D models of spacecraft into the game and make videos? Can the game import 3D Studio Max files for eg and use them in the game? These would be detailed spacecraft based on latest research and I wish to add realistic images/videos in the article I am writing, thanks for your time.

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/advanced-propulsion-literature-paul-titze-9a57c/


Cheers, Paul.
